title: Larry White on the Clash of Economic Ideas
description: Lawrence H. White of George Mason University and author of The Clash of Economic Ideas talks to EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the economists and their ideas of the past one hundred years. They discuss Keynes and Hayek, monetary policy and the Great Depression, Germany after the Second World War, the economy of India, and the future of monetary policy.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
